extendedInfo.description: *** The best Android board dice game around! ***"A New Challenging Farkle Dice Game You Can't Stop Playing!" - appeggs.comFarkle Live brings a brand new look to the classic Farkle dice game. Join the best Farkle game made for Android and play ONLINE against thousands of users!Farkle Live is a dice game played by one or two players over the Internet. The players take turns rolling the dice, with the objective of collecting 5,000/10,000 points quicker than their opponent in an ONLINE multiplayer game or reach a target score from 5,000 to 10,000 in 10 rounds in a solo game.Each player's turn starts by rolling six dice to score points. As long as they roll scoring combinations, they can roll the remaining dice, or collect their points.If your roll does not score any points, you get a 'FARKLE', losing all points accumulated for that turn.If the player manages to score on all six dice, they get a 'Bonus Round' and may choose to roll all six dice again or collect the points.FEATURES:- improve you skill in TRAINING mode- play for fun and win chips- PLAY ONLINE with random opponents- choose to play to 5000 or 10000 points- use ENERGY in ONLINE mode- log in with your FACEBOOK account- PLAY with your FACEBOOK friends!- you can EVEN play with FRIENDS who have iOS!- receive FREE CHIPS from your friends- receive FREE CHIPS by completing offers- alternative login for non-Facebook users- roll a Magic Golden Die and get x2 BONUS to chips in bank!

reviews.title: AVOID THIS
reviews.comment: Training pops every time you open it! I KNOW HOW TO PLAY IT!!! Freezes my Galaxy Note II.
reviews.author: Julie M

reviews.title: Love it!!!!
reviews.comment: I am so addicted to this game. Play it all the time. Wish the bounses were more often then one time per day but otger than that no complaints
reviews.author: Sarah Bales

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: I have to keep uninstalling and reinstalling,   But .... I have found a glitch in the game and I can win almost all the games!!!
reviews.author: Donna Bender

reviews.comment: Lots of fun but I hate when it freezes
reviews.author: Cheryl Meaney

reviews.title: Addicting fun
reviews.comment: I really enjoy the game.I\'ve played since i was a kid,now I can play with all kinds of folks.Would be nice if chat was added and that you can add random ppl to friends not just facebook buddies.Also sometimes seems AI cheats when you only play for coins,I like winning with a challenge an don\'t mind loosing either but that part needs a lil tweeking.Love this game.5stars if ya add chat,add friends not from Fb. and fix AI.No glitches Great set up,Programmers did excellent.
reviews.author: Kathy Hoskins

reviews.title: Horrible online play
reviews.comment: The game interface is good but the online multiplayer is horrible, 90% of the time it says your opponents connection was lost. In other words you never get to play anyone and when you do is always the same \"guest\" player over and over. Let\'s be honest, playing the computer is pointless as it\'s biased so multiplayer is the only fun way to play this game on a phone. If the multiplayer worked right I\'d give this game a higher rating but as it is, it\'s lucky I even gave it 3 stars.
